item.title: Twitter Updates for 2009-12-17
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded:
• Have wrestled with far too many programming languages today. Also am ashamed to admit I've become comfortable with C#. I will cry to sleep. #
  • RT: Whoa. Bryan Singer is back on X-Men: (via @McKelvie) #
  • RT: WET Designs latest invention. It's impressive in person. Looks almost like fireworks. (via @Brian_Fey) #
  • Eeeeeerieeee "Abandoned Disney Water Park photos: " (via @eccentriclee @pafford) #
  • Current temp in Boston: 16°F feels like -1°F! #

Powered by Twitter Tools
